Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class AuctionController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.AuctionController
@Controller public class AuctionController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with auctioning
Since:
1/01/2023
Author:
Thomas Haley tjh1019@sru.edu

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    forceEndAuction(long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
    Finds a given shipment by ID, then redirects to the force end auction confirmation page if the shipment has any bids placed on it If the shipment has no bids on it, or is not AVAILABLE SHIPMENT, returns the user to their page and alerts the master that the operation has failed
    String

    Finds the shipment by the ID, then allows the user to confirm or deny the ending of auction for the shipment
    String

    Finds given shipment by ID, then redirects the user to confirm or deny the push of the shipment to auction

  • Method Details

    • forceEndAuction

      @RequestMapping("/forceendauction/{id}") public String forceEndAuction(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a given shipment by ID, then redirects to the force end auction confirmation page if the shipment has any bids placed on it If the shipment has no bids on it, or is not AVAILABLE SHIPMENT, returns the user to their page and alerts the master that the operation has failed
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment that won the auction
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /force/forceendauctionconfirm

    • pushShipment

      @RequestMapping("/pushshipment/{id}") public String pushShipment(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds given shipment by ID, then redirects the user to confirm or deny the push of the shipment to auction
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment that won the auction
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /push/pushshipmentconfirm

    • pushShipmentConfirmation

      @RequestMapping("/pushshipmentconfirmation/{id}") public String pushShipmentConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Allows the user to confirm or deny the shipment to move into the auction
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment that is being pushed to auction
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects the user to the base shipments page

      Finds the shipment by ID and removes that shipment from the auction
      Parameters:
      id - of shipment being removed from auction
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:

      Finds the shipment by the ID and then redirects the user back to the base page if they confirm or deny the confirmation
      Parameters:

      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session

    • toggleAuctioning

      @GetMapping("/toggleauctioning/{id}") public String toggleAuctioning(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds the user by ID, then returns the user to a confirmation page for toggling auctioning
      Parameters:
      id - of the user the auctioning is being toggled on
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /toggle/toggleauctioningconfirm

    • toggleAuctioningconfirmation

      @GetMapping("/toggleauctioningconfirmation/{id}") public String toggleAuctioningconfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds the user by ID, then returns the user to the base users page if the confirm or deny toggling auctioning
      Parameters:
      id - of the user the auctioning is being toggled on
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects the user back to the base users page
